last_episode_to_air.name: The Gate
last_episode_to_air.overview: With thousands of lives at stake, the Dream Raiders fight to stop Qi-Feng from carrying out the final step in his master plan.

name: Dream Raider
overview: Set in the near future, “Dream Raider” features a misfit team of scientists and cops that are trying to get to the bottom of a criminal conspiracy that exploits human consciousness.

episodes.name: Prisoner 489445
episodes.overview: A case involving several missing girls leads Detective Li Xiao to the one person who may be able to help: a professor who has been in jail for the past decade.

episodes.name: Dreamscape’s Battleground
episodes.overview: While investigating the alleged mass suicides of two unrelated groups, the Dream Raider team realizes there’s a bigger conspiracy at hand.

episodes.name: An Exclusive Love Experience
episodes.overview: When the Dream Raider team tries to defuse a suicide bomber’s inner turmoil, they discover the existence of a worldwide crime organization.

episodes.name: A Secret Mountain Facility
episodes.overview: Rhyzen’s CEO approaches the Dream Raider team for help after he finds out his company is running a secret mental facility.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Shines
episodes.overview: Li Xiao meets a mysterious girl who might be linked to the worldwide criminal organization that the Dream Raiders are after.

episodes.name: The Avenger
episodes.overview: Li Xiao meets a mysterious girl who might be linked to the worldwide criminal organization that the Dream Raiders are after.

episodes.name: Mind Maze
episodes.overview: An-Ya and Tian-Li both revisit the past in the dreamscapes of others, while Li Xiao tries to rescue them.

episodes.name: The Gate
episodes.overview: With thousands of lives at stake, the Dream Raiders fight to stop Qi-Feng from carrying out the final step in his master plan.
